name: Solactive AG
membership: PRI - Principles for Responsible Investment - Signatory of the PRI Principles
goal:
Solactive AG is a Germany-based index provider operating globally and growing at a fast pace. Since 2007, we have been developing tailor-made and multi-asset class index solutions for ETFs and other index-linked investment products at competitive prices.Currently present in Frankfurt, Dresden, Berlin, Toronto and Hong Kong, our ambition is to continue expanding our footprint in order to better serve our clients around the world. Solactive AG now calculates indices for more than 400 clients in Europe, America and Asia. Approximately 200 billion USD are invested in products linked to more than 9,000 indices calculated by Solactive AG globally, primarily in the form of more than 350 ETFs.* Managed by Steffen Scheuble, CEO, Christian Vollmuth, CRO and Dirk Urmoneit, CIO Solactive AG is organized in two business units, Indexing and Research. The company employs 170 people and is owned by its current management.
*As of November 2018
euInitiatives: Solactive is currently observing relevant regulatory initatives in the field of indexing, mainly the EU Benchmarks Regulation and related legal acts such as the Market Abuse Regulation.
